title: C.D. Rabo de Peixe
text:
Clube Desportivo Rabo de Peixe "(known as CD Rabo de Peixe or Rabo de Peixe)," is a <a href="Portugal">Portuguese</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Rabo%20de%20Peixe">Rabo de Peixe</a>, <a href="Ribeira%20Grande%20%28Azores%29">Ribeira Grande</a> on the island of <a href="S%C3%A3o%20Miguel%20Island">São Miguel</a> in the <a href="Azores%20Islands">Azores</a>.
Background.
CD Rabo de Peixe currently plays in the <a href="AF%20Ponta%20Delgada">AF Ponta Delgada</a> 1ª Divisão (known as the Campeonato de S. Miguel) which is the fifth tier of <a href="Portuguese%20football%20league%20system">Portuguese football</a>. The club was founded in 1985 and they play their home matches at the Campo de Jogos Bom Jesus in <a href="Rabo%20de%20Peixe">Rabo de Peixe</a>, <a href="Ribeira%20Grande%20%28Azores%29">Ribeira Grande</a>. The stadium is able to accommodate 2,000 spectators.
The club is affiliated to <a href="Associa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20de%20Futebol%20de%20Ponta%20Delgada">Associação de Futebol de Ponta Delgada</a> and has competed in the AF Ponta Delgada Taça. The club has also entered the national cup competition known as <a href="Ta%C3%A7a%20de%20Portugal">Taça de Portugal</a> on a few occasions.
